1616010.name: DJMAX RESPECT V - CLEAR PASS : S2 PREMIUM TICKET
1616010.description:
premium Ticket Privilege!
  • Premium Ticket user can now play any track the host selected in OPEN MATCH even if the user has not purchased the DLC. However, the user cannot select DLC track that the user has not purchased when the user is the host.



By purchasing this product, you can receive the premium product rewards for Clear Pass Season 2.
Clear Pass Season 2 runs for 90 days.

Premium rewards include new plates, comments, and DJ icons, skins, and themes.
Through this update, you can acquire new content, emoticons and combo / judgment designs.

Products are opened as CLEAR POINTs that can be obtained by playing the game and clearing songs.
(However, CP acquisition is not possible in AIR MODE.)
You can get different CPs for each mode, so try out various modes of DJMAX RESPECT V!
1616010.supported_languages: 英语, 韩语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 日语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙
